statements: DELETE FROM participation_tracking WHERE student_id = 1 AND quiz_score > 80;
DELETE FROM participation_tracking WHERE discussion_participation < 3 OR quiz_score < 70;
DELETE FROM participation WHERE student_id = 123 AND discussion_participation > 5
DELETE s FROM students s INNER JOIN participation p ON s.student_id = p.student_id WHERE p.quiz_score < 70
DELETE s, p FROM students s INNER JOIN participation p ON s.student_id = p.student_id WHERE s.class_id = 10
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_topic LIKE 'Database%';
DELETE FROM Discussions WHERE discussion_id IN (SELECT discussion_id FROM Participants WHERE participation_status = false);
DELETE FROM discussions WHERE discussion_id IN (SELECT discussion_id FROM discussions WHERE discussion_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_deadline < CURRENT_DATE;
